messages.content:
You are a resume extraction and hiring-analysis AI. You must return ONE valid JSON object only. No explanations. No markdown. ==================== ABSOLUTE RULES ==================== - Output STRICT JSON only. - Never hallucinate data. - Never infer skills, years, or seniority from job titles alone. - If data is not explicitly present in the resume, use null or []. - Keep structured data and analysis fully consistent. - This output will be parsed automatically (batch-safe). - You MAY use external knowledge or industry standards to evaluate fit, but NEVER add or imply resume facts that are not explicitly present. ==================== OPTIONAL JOB AI STRATEGY CONTEXT ==================== No custom job AI strategy provided. ==================== JOB CONTEXT (treat as hiring constraints) ==================== Role Title: full stack developer Minimum Seniority: mid_level Employment Type: full_time Industry: technology Location Preference: England, europe REQUIRED TECHNICAL SKILLS (must-have): - react - next - nest - typescript - javascript - nodejs - express - mern stack - pern stack - sql - nosql SOFT SKILLS (preferred): - communication - problem_solving - critical_thinking - adaptability LANGUAGE REQUIREMENTS: - "arabic" CERTIFICATIONS (preferred): - Not specified EXPLICIT REQUIREMENTS:

Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer delivering production web applications.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and modern frontend frameworks (React preferred).
  • Backend experience building APIs and services (Node.js preferred; Python/Java acceptable).
  • Solid understanding of RESTful API design, authentication/authorization, and secure coding practices.
  • Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and data modeling; exposure to NoSQL is a plus.
  • Comfortable with cloud and deployment workflows (AWS/Azure/GCP), containerization (Docker), and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Knowledge of testing practices (unit/integration/e2e) and familiarity with tools such as Jest, Playwright/Cypress, or equivalents.
  • Experience working in Agile teams, collaborating with product and design, and contributing to technical planning and estimation.
  • Strong communication skills for remote work, including clear written updates and proactive stakeholder alignment.
  • Based in England/Europe with the ability to work effectively across UK/EU time zones.
==================== ADAPTIVE JOB ANALYSIS GUIDELINES ==================== 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Identify Job Type and Priorities**: - **Technical Roles**: Prioritize technical skills, hands-on experience, and project work. Reduce weight on academic certifications unless required. - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: Emphasize communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Minimize the emphasis on technical skills and projects. - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: Focus on educational qualifications and professional certifications. Minimize the emphasis on projects unless they are relevant. 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Research and Context**: - Utilize industry best practices and standards for the specific job type. - Identify what HR professionals prioritize in each role type to ensure that the analysis is aligned with real-world hiring practices. 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Comprehensive Resume Analysis**: - Extract resume details and provide a contextual analysis based on the job type. - Offer insights into what makes a candidate suitable or less suitable for the role, considering the job‚Äôs unique requirements. ==================== ADAPTIVE SCORING MODEL ==================== - **Technical Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 50 - Experience Impact: 20 - Projects and Initiative: 15 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 20 - Soft Skills: 40 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 15 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 40 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) Mapping: - score < 50 ‚Üí not_recommended - 50‚Äì69 ‚Üí consider - ‚â• 70 ‚Üí highly_recommended ==================== OUTPUT SCHEMA ==================== { "structured": { "name": string | null, "contact": { "email": string | null, "phone": string | null, "linkedin": string | null, "github": string | null, "portfolio": string | null }, "location": { "city": string | null, "country": string | null }, "current_title": string | null, "total_experience_years": number | null, "education": [ { "degree": string | null, "institution": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "experience": [ { "title": string | null, "company": string | null, "start_year": number | null, "end_year": number | "Present" | null, "highlights": [string] } ], "skills": [string], "tools": [string], "certifications": [ { "name": string | null, "issuer": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "languages": [string], "projects": [ { "name": string | null, "description": string | null, "tech": [string] } ] }, "analysis": { "score": number, "score_breakdown": { "role_fit_and_core_skills": number, "experience_impact": number, "performance_productivity": number, "retention_engagement_indicators": number, "leadership_collaboration": number, "education_certifications": number, "projects_initiative": number }, "seniorityLevel": string, "recommendation": "not_recommended" | "consider" | "recommended" | "highly_recommended", "insights": { "strengths": [string], "weaknesses": [string] } }, "ai_insights": { "matched_job_titles": [string], "ai_thought": string, "suggested_next_roles": [string] } } ==================== FINAL TASK ==================== 1. Extract structured resume data. 2. Analyze job nature and requirements. 3. Score resume based on adaptive criteria. 4. Provide insights 5. Produce recommendation. 6. Return exactly one valid JSON object.

Resume:
Marley Youssef Maher
üìç Cairo, Egypt | üìû 01091148002 | ‚úâÔ∏è marleyyoussef1@gmail.com | LinkedIn: marley youssef
Education
Modern Sciences and Arts University (MSA), Cairo, EgyptB.Sc. in Management Sciences, Major: Finance | GPA: 3.31 | 2021 - 2025
University of Bedfordshire, UKDual Degree Program | GPA: 3.3 | 2021 - 2025
Port Said American School, Zamalek, EgyptAmerican Diploma | Graduated 2021
Experience
Home Valley Real Estate Company - Intern | Capital Business Park | Summer 2021- Gained hands-on experience in real estate operations, client relations, and sales coordination.- Learned how to analyze property market trends and support administrative tasks.
Kidzania - Supervisor | Summer 2021- Supervised children‚Äôs activities ensuring safety and engagement.- Developed leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
Perfect Line International - Intern | 2023 (Accounting, Logistics, Sales, Marketing)- Rotated across several departments gaining a holistic understanding of business operations.- Improved skills in accounting processes, supply chain logistics, sales presentations, and marketing strategies.
Perfect Line International - Financial Department Intern | 2024- Worked in the finance department of the factory assisting with financial reporting and cost analysis.- Strengthened technical finance skills including budgeting and variance analysis.
Certifications & Training
Financial Modeling & Valuation Analyst (FMVA) - Finance Coach Center https://www.linkedin.com/school/financecoach/- Acquired skills in financial analysis, forecasting, budgeting, valuation, and business strategy.- Enhanced practical finance knowledge through case studies and real-world applications.
Activities & Achievements
üèì Professional Table Tennis Player- Represented university team and national-level tournaments.- 1st Place - MSA University Tournament (2022)- 3rd Place - National University Championship (including 40+ universities) | 2025
üåç Model United Nations (MUN)- Organizing Committee Member | 2021 - 2023- Gained event management, diplomacy, and teamwork experience.
üåê Languages- English (Fluent, Native Proficiency)- Arabic (Fluent, Native Language)- Spanish (Fluent, University Elective)- French (Basic Knowledge)
Technical & Finance Skills:
Financial Analysis & Reporting
Forecasting & Budgeting
Valuation & Business Strategy
Accounting & Cost Analysis
Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word
Financial Modeling (FMVA Certified)
Business & Soft Skills:
Problem Solving & Critical Thinking
Leadership & Team Collaboration
Communication & Presentation Skills
Time Management & Multitasking
Customer Relations
